description: Detecting suspicious error log events which lead to potential security threats
name: Anomaly detection for Tomcat - Critical
query: path: "/home/cyber/research/tomcat/28_caused_by.log" and message: "Failed authenticate() test" or message : "Security Violation, attempt to use Restricted Class:" or message : "Calling hasUserDataPermission()" or message : "Checking for all roles mode:" or message : "Invalid escape character in cookie value" or message : "Calling hasUserDataPermission()" or message : "Sendfile configured to send more data than was available"
